translation.en: In Al Gore's film, he describes how Earth is in peril.

translation.en: I made up my mind, right then and there,

translation.en: to change how I lived and to do whatever I possibly could to find a way

translation.en: for all of us to live together in balance with the planet sustainably forever.

translation.en: But as the years went by, it seemed as if things were getting worse.

translation.en: His theory was wrong.
translation.es: Su teoría era incorrecta.

translation.en: The culling finally ended,
translation.es: El sacrificio terminó finalmente,

translation.en: but not until tens of thousands of elephants and their families were killed.
translation.es: pero recién después de matar a decenas de miles de elefantes y sus familias.

translation.en: This is not someone I would ever take ecological advice from.
translation.es: No es alguien de quien yo aceptaría consejos ecológicos.

translation.en: It turns out, the cattle industry
translation.es: Resulta que la industria ganadera

translation.en: is having the same effect on wildlife in the United States.
translation.es: está teniendo el mismo efecto en la vida silvestre de Estados Unidos.

translation.en: The government has been rounding up horses en masse,
translation.es: El gobierno estuvo juntando caballos masivamente,

translation.en: and we now have more wild horses and burros in government holding facilities,
translation.es: y ahora tenemos más caballos y burros salvajes en instalaciones...

translation.en: 50,000 wild horses and burros in government holding facilities,
translation.es: Deniz Bolbol Campaña American Wild Horse Preservation ...cincuenta mil caballos y burros salvajes en instalaciones,

translation.en: than we have free on the range.
translation.es: más que los que tenemos libres.

translation.en: Basically, you have ranchers
translation.es: Hay ganaderos

translation.en: who get to graze on our public lands for a fraction of the going rate.
translation.es: que pastorean en tierras públicas por una pequeña parte del precio normal.

translation.en: So they're getting this huge tax subsidy
translation.es: Obtienen un enorme subsidio impositivo,

translation.en: that's about one-fifteenth of the going rate.
translation.es: un quinceavo del precio normal.

translation.en: And what the Bureau of Land Management has to do is say,
translation.es: Y la Oficina de Gestión de Tierras dice:

translation.en: "How much forage and water is on the land?"
translation.es: ¿Cuánta comida y agua hay en las tierras?.

translation.en: And then they divvy it up.
translation.es: Y luego lo dividen.

translation.en: They give so much to the cows, so much to "wildlife,"
translation.es: Dan una cantidad a las vacas, a la vida silvestre,

translation.en: and so much to the wild horses and burros.
translation.es: a los caballos y burros salvajes.

translation.en: And what we see is
translation.es: Y lo que vemos es

translation.en: the lion's share of the forage and water is going to the livestock industry.
translation.es: que la mejor parte de la comida y el agua va a la industria ganadera.

translation.en: And then they scapegoat the horses and burros and say,
translation.es: Luego usan de chivos expiatorios a los caballos y burros:

translation.en: "There are too many horses and burros. Let's remove them."
translation.es: Hay demasiados caballos y burros. Los sacamos.

translation.en: I always tell people that wild horses and burros are just one of the victims
translation.es: Yo digo que los caballos y burros salvajes son solo algunas de las víctimas

translation.en: of the management of our public lands for livestock
translation.es: de la gestión de tierras públicas para ganado

translation.en: because we also see the predator killing going on.
translation.es: porque vemos que sigue la matanza depredadora. Deniz Bolbol Campaña American Wild Horse Preservation

translation.en: We know wolves are now being targeted by ranchers, to get rid of wolves.
translation.es: Deniz Bolbol Campaña American Wild Horse Preservation Vemos que ahora los lobos son un blanco de los ganaderos, se deshacen de ellos.

translation.en: USDA has aircraft, and all they do is aerial gunning of predators.
translation.es: El USDA tiene aviones, y solo disparan desde el aire a depredadores.

translation.en: So, all a rancher does is call up and say, "I've got coyote here."
translation.es: Un ganadero llama y dice: Tengo un coyote aquí.

translation.en: They'll come over and they'll shoot the coyote,
translation.es: Van y disparan al coyote,

translation.en: or they'll shoot the mountain lion, or they'll shoot the bobcat.
translation.es: o disparan al puma, o al lince.

translation.en: And this is all for ranching.
translation.es: Y todo para la ganadería.

translation.en: In Washington state, after cattle were found to be attacked on public lands,
translation.es: En el estado de Washington, atacaron ganado en tierras públicas... Will Anderson FUNDADOR DE GREENPEACE ALASKA

translation.en: where they were grazing under permit,
translation.es: Ex miembro del directorio de Greenpeace Estados Unidos ...donde estaban pastoreando con permisos,

translation.en: Washington state decided to kill the entire Wedge pack of wolves.
translation.es: y el estado de Washington decidió matar a toda la jauría Wedge de lobos.

translation.en: And those wolves were not introduced.
translation.es: Y esos lobos no fueron introducidos.

translation.en: They had in-migrated from Canada,
translation.es: Habían inmigrado desde Canadá,

translation.en: but they're no longer there.
translation.es: pero allí ya no hay.

translation.en: It starts at the local level, with the Bureau of Land Managements,
translation.es: Esto comienza a nivel local, con la Oficina de Gestión de Tierras,

translation.en: but then it goes all the way to Congress.
translation.es: pero llega hasta el Congreso.

translation.en: And we see Congress, sitting there, willing to allow
translation.es: Deniz Bolbol Campaña American Wild Horse Preservation Y en el Congreso están dispuestos a permitir

translation.en: this type of mismanagement of our public lands to continue.
translation.es: que continúe este tipo de desmanejo de las tierras públicas.

translation.en: It is the insistence of and the lobbying power of
translation.es: La insistencia y el poder de presión

translation.en: the animal agriculture industry
translation.es: de la industria ganadera

translation.en: that continues to see wolves killed,
translation.es: siguen haciendo matar lobos,

translation.en: continues to see an insistence
translation.es: sigue insistiendo

translation.en: that predators be maintained at a low level that does not benefit ecosystems.
translation.es: con que haya pocos depredadores, lo cual no beneficia los ecosistemas.

translation.en: I've seen so many pieces of land.
translation.es: Vi muchas tierras.

translation.en: I've looked at so many environmental assessments
translation.es: Vi muchas valoraciones ambientales

translation.en: from the Bureau of Land Management
translation.es: de la Oficina de Gestión de Tierras

translation.en: where they say the range lands are not meeting standards.
translation.es: que dicen que las tierras de pastoreo no cumplen con los estándares.

translation.en: And they say, straight-up,
translation.es: Y dicen, francamente,

translation.en: livestock grazing is a cause for not meeting range standards.
translation.es: que el pastoreo ganadero es una causa del incumplimiento de estándares.

translation.en: And yet, they will continue to allow livestock grazing.
translation.es: Pero siguen permitiendo el pastoreo ganadero.

translation.en: They're at the very core of
translation.es: Son esenciales

translation.en: making sure that cougars are treed by hounds,
translation.es: para que los pumas queden arrinconados por los perros de caza,

translation.en: and that wolf packs are run down,
translation.es: que las jaurías de lobos queden deterioradas,

translation.en: and that hunting seasons are opened up year-round,
translation.es: que haya temporada de caza todo el año,

translation.en: and that traps are set so that they can suffer.
translation.es: y que se pongan trampas para que sufran.

translation.en: If anyone cares about
translation.es: Si a alguien le importan

translation.en: wild horses and wildlife and public lands and the environment,
translation.es: los caballos salvajes, la vida silvestre, las tierras públicas, el medio ambiente,

translation.en: you can't ignore the impact, the negative impact,
translation.es: no puede ignorar el impacto negativo

translation.en: that livestock grazing is having on our public lands in the West.
translation.es: que tiene el pastoreo de ganado en tierras públicas del oeste.

translation.en: I've added up the costs of animal food production
translation.es: Sumé los costos de la producción alimenticia animal... DAVID SIMON Abogado, autor de Meatonomics

translation.en: that the producers don't actually bear themselves.
translation.es: DAVID SIMON Abogado, autor de Meatonomics ...que los productores no pagan.

translation.en: These are the hidden costs, or the externalized costs,
translation.es: Son los costos ocultos, o externalizados,

translation.en: that they impose on society.
translation.es: que imponen a la sociedad.

translation.en: And those are in categories like health care, environmental damage,
translation.es: Se encuentran en categorías como salud, daño ambiental,

translation.en: subsidies, damage to fisheries, and even cruelty.
translation.es: subsidios, daños a pesqueras, e incluso crueldad.

translation.en: If you take those externalized costs, which are about $414 billion...
translation.es: Considerando esos costos externalizados, unos $414.000 millones...

translation.en: If the meat and dairy industries were required to internalize those costs,
translation.es: Si las industrias cárnica y láctea debieran internalizar esos costos,

translation.en: if they had to bear those costs themselves,
translation.es: si debieran pagar esos costos,

translation.en: the costs of the retail prices of meat and dairy would skyrocket.
translation.es: los costos de precios minoristas de carnes y lácteos se dispararían.

translation.en: So a $5 carton of eggs would go to $13.
translation.es: Una caja de huevos de $5 se iría a $13.

translation.en: A $4 Big Mac would go to $11.
translation.es: Un Big Mac de $4 se iría a $11.

translation.en: Whether you eat meat or not,
translation.es: Así comas carne o no,

translation.en: whether you're an omnivore or an herbivore,
translation.es: seas omnívoro o herbívoro,

translation.en: you are paying part of the costs of somebody else's consumption.
translation.es: estás pagando parte de los costos del consumo de otros.

translation.en: So that when somebody goes into a McDonald's and buys a Big Mac for $4,
translation.es: Así cuando alguien va a McDonald's y compra un Big Mac por $4,

translation.en: there's another $7 of costs that's imposed on society.
translation.es: hay otros $7 de costos impuestos a la sociedad.

translation.en: I'm paying that. You're paying that, whether you eat meat or not.
translation.es: Yo pago eso. Usted paga eso, coma carne o no.

translation.en: When you really look at who's benefiting,
translation.es: Cuando miras quién se beneficia,

translation.en: and who lobbied for this system of agriculture,
translation.es: y quién presionó a favor de este sistema de agricultura...

translation.en: it's the largest food producers in the country and the largest meat producers.
translation.es: Wenonah Hauter FOOD & WATER WATCH - Directora ejecutiva ...son grandes productores alimenticios y grandes productores cárnicos.

translation.en: And once they become so large and wealthy,
translation.es: Y cuando se vuelven tan grandes y ricos,

translation.en: then they can dictate the federal policies around producing food
translation.es: pueden dictar las políticas federales de producción alimenticia INDUSTRIA GANADERA DE ESTADOS UNIDOS Comité de Agricultura del Senado

translation.en: because they have so much political power.
translation.es: porque tienen mucho poder político.

translation.en: I knew I needed to talk to an animal agriculture lobby group
translation.es: Yo debía hablar con un grupo de presión de agricultura animal

translation.en: to see what they had to say.
translation.es: para ver qué tenían para decir.

translation.en: If they could silence the government,
translation.es: Si podían silenciar al gobierno,

translation.en: are they influencing and possibly have connections to
translation.es: ¿están influyendo y tienen conexiones

translation.en: these environmental groups as well?
translation.es: con estos grupos ambientalistas también?

translation.en: Animal Agriculture Alliance, one of the biggest livestock lobby groups in America,
translation.es: Animal Agriculture Alliance, un importante grupo de presión ganadero,

translation.en: has agreed to an interview.
translation.es: aceptó conceder una entrevista.

translation.en: Greenpeace won't give us an interview,
translation.es: Greenpeace no nos da una entrevista,

translation.en: but Animal Agriculture Alliance has agreed to an interview.
translation.es: pero Animal Agriculture Alliance sí.

translation.en: Now, that...
translation.es: Bien...

translation.en: Now, that is saying something.
translation.es: No es poco.

translation.en: People hear the word GMOs, and that's a really scary term.
translation.es: La gente oye genéticamente modificado y se asusta.

translation.en: And again, I think Agriculture's struggled to explain what that means,
translation.es: ANIMAL AGRICULTURE ALLIANCE Grupo de presión ganadero El grupo luchó por explicar el significado,

translation.en: but in reality, what we've done is to use technology
translation.es: lo que hicimos fue usar la tecnología

translation.en: to make advancements in how we raise crops and how we raise animals.
translation.es: para avanzar en los cultivos y la crianza animal.

translation.en: We're not gonna feed the world
translation.es: No alimentaremos al mundo

translation.en: going back to how it was 100 years ago where all the animals were pasture-fed.
translation.es: como hace 100 años, cuando todos los animales pastoreaban.

translation.en: We didn't just move animals inside
translation.es: No es que metimos los animales adentro

translation.en: and just implement these large vertically-integrated systems
translation.es: e implementamos estos grandes sistemas integrados verticalmente

translation.en: because of sustainability.
translation.es: por la sostenibilidad.

translation.en: It certainly reduces the environmental impact
translation.es: Ciertamente eso reduce el impacto ambiental

translation.en: while improving animal well-being and food safety.
translation.es: y mejora el bienestar animal y la seguridad alimenticia.

translation.en: So you're saying that animals like it just as much being inside...
translation.es: ¿Está diciendo que a los animales les gusta también estar adentro...?

translation.en: Say the chickens and the cows like being just as much inside
translation.es: ¿A las gallinas y vacas les gusta tanto estar adentro

translation.en: as pasture grass-fed?
translation.es: como estar pastoreando?

translation.en: In a lot of cases, it's been a significant improvement in their well-being,
translation.es: En muchos casos, fue una gran mejora en su bienestar,

translation.en: just in terms of the amount of care they can get, individualized care.
translation.es: por el cuidado que reciben, un cuidado individualizado.

translation.en: Does the meat and dairy industry
translation.es: ¿La industria cárnica y láctea

translation.en: ever support or donate to environmental non-profits?
translation.es: apoya o dona a las ONG ambientalistas?

translation.en: I don't know that I would want to comment on that.
translation.es: No sé si quiero hablar de eso.

translation.en: Yeah, l... I don't...
translation.es: No...

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.es: No sé.

translation.en: I don't know that we would know what they donate to or don't donate to.
translation.es: No sé si tenemos información sobre si donan o no. Voz de Kay Smith - Presidente y directora ejecutiva - Animal Agriculture Alliance

translation.en: Does meat and dairy industry ever support or donate to, say, Greenpeace?
translation.es: ¿La industria cárnica y láctea apoya o dona, digamos, a Greenpeace?

translation.en: Again, I don't know that I would feel comfortable...
translation.es: Como decía, no sé si me sentiría cómoda...

translation.en: Hey, sorry we didn't get back to you earlier.
translation.es: Hola, lamentamos no haber respondido antes.

translation.en: I have some bad news.
translation.es: Tengo malas noticias.

translation.en: Unfortunately, we are no longer able to fund your film project.
translation.es: Llamada de financiador de la película Lamentablemente, ya no podremos financiar su película.

translation.en: We had a meeting, and due to the growing controversial subject matter,
translation.es: Nos reunimos, y debido al tema, cada vez más controvertido,

translation.en: we have some concerns and have to pull out.
translation.es: tenemos ciertas preocupaciones y debemos retirarnos.

translation.en: Why was this subject so controversial?
translation.es: ¿Por qué era tan controvertido este tema?

translation.en: The first person I could think to speak with was Howard Lyman,
translation.es: La primera persona con quien pensé hablar fue Howard Lyman,

translation.en: who had been sued by cattlemen
translation.es: que fue demandado por ganaderos

translation.en: for simply speaking the truth about animal agriculture on The Oprah Winfrey Show.
translation.es: por decir la verdad sobre el tema en The Oprah Winfrey Show.

translation.en: I was born on the largest dairy farm in the state of Montana in 1938.
translation.es: Nací en la mayor granja láctea del estado de Montana en 1938.

translation.en: Grew up my entire life on a livestock farm.
translation.es: HOWARD LYMAN Ex ganadero Viví toda mi vida en una granja ganadera.

translation.en: Went to Montana State University, got a degree in agriculture.
translation.es: Fui a la Montana State University y obtuve una licenciatura en agricultura.

translation.en: Came back and started
translation.es: Volví y lancé

translation.en: a mega agriculture endeavor
translation.es: un megaemprendimiento agrícola

translation.en: where I had 10,000 acres of crop,
translation.es: con 4.000 hectáreas de cultivos,

translation.en: 7,000 head of cattle,
translation.es: 7.000 cabezas de ganado

translation.en: and about 30 employees, so...
translation.es: y unos 30 empleados.

translation.en: I spent 45 years of my life in animal agriculture,
translation.es: Pasé 45 años de mi vida en la cría de animales,

translation.en: and so, I've been there, done that.
translation.es: así que conozco el tema.

translation.en: When I was on The Oprah Show, we had the food disparagement law.
translation.es: Cuando estuve en The Oprah Show, estaba la ley de difamación alimenticia.

translation.en: Now, the food disparagement law, in my opinion, was unconstitutional,
translation.es: La ley de difamación alimenticia, en mi opinión, era inconstitucional,

translation.en: but what it basically said, that it was against the law
translation.es: pero decía que era ilegal

translation.en: to say something you knew to be false about a perishable commodity.
translation.es: decir algo que uno considerara falso sobre un bien perecedero.

translation.en: I didn't say anything on The Oprah Show I thought to be false.
translation.es: En The Oprah Show no dije nada que yo considerara falso.

translation.en: I went there and told the truth.
translation.es: Fui y dije la verdad.

translation.en: Now, it took five years and hundreds of thousands of dollars
translation.es: Me llevó cinco años y cientos de miles de dólares

translation.en: to end up extricating myself
translation.es: liberarme

translation.en: from the suits from the cattle industry.
translation.es: de las demandas de la industria ganadera.

translation.en: But if I was to go on The Oprah Show today,
translation.es: Pero si yo fuera hoy a The Oprah Show

translation.en: say exactly the same thing today that I said back then,
translation.es: y dijera exactamente lo mismo que dije entonces,

translation.en: I would be guilty.
translation.es: sería culpable.

translation.en: And for me, when they were talking about the food disparagement law,
translation.es: Para mí, cuando hablaban de la ley de difamación alimenticia,

translation.en: it was the fact of whether I told the truth or not.
translation.es: la cuestión era si yo decía la verdad o no.

translation.en: You can go today and tell the truth,
translation.es: Hoy puedes ir y decir la verdad

translation.en: and you will be guilty,
translation.es: y serás culpable,

translation.en: because if you cause a disruption
translation.es: porque si causas una alteración

translation.en: in the profits of the animal industry,
translation.es: en las ganancias de la industria animal,

translation.en: you're guilty under the PATRIOT Act.
translation.es: eres culpable frente a la Ley Patriótica.

translation.en: Do you think there should be any concern of us making this documentary?
translation.es: ¿Piensa que deberíamos preocuparnos al realizar este documental?

translation.en: Of course.
translation.es: Por supuesto.

translation.en: If you don't realize right now
translation.es: Si no entiendes ya mismo

translation.en: that you're putting your neck on the chopping block,
translation.es: que estás poniendo el cuello en la guillotina,

translation.en: you better take that camera and throw it away.
translation.es: toma esa cámara y arrójala.

translation.en: The animal agriculture industry
translation.es: WILL POTTER - Periodista Autor de Green Is The New Red La industria ganadera

translation.en: is one of the most powerful industries on the planet.
translation.es: es una de las industrias más poderosas del planeta.

translation.en: I think most people in this country are aware of the influence
translation.es: La mayoría de la gente en este país conoce la influencia

translation.en: of money and industry on politics,
translation.es: del dinero y la industria en la política,

translation.en: and we really see that clearly on display with this industry in particular.
translation.es: y lo vemos claramente en esta industria en particular.

translation.en: Most people would be shocked to learn that animal rights and environmental activists
translation.es: Muchos se asombrarían, los activistas por los derechos animales y ambientalistas

translation.en: are the number one domestic terrorism threat according to the FBI.
translation.es: son según el FBI la principal amenaza terrorista interna.

translation.en: -And why is that? -It's a difficult question to answer,
translation.es: - ¿Y por qué? - Es una pregunta difícil de responder,

translation.en: why these groups are at the top of the FBI's priorities.
translation.es: por qué estos grupos son la prioridad del FBI.

translation.en: I think a big part of it is that
translation.es: Creo que en buena medida

translation.en: they, more than really any other social movements today,
translation.es: porque ellos, más que los demás movimientos sociales,

translation.en: are directly threatening corporate profits.
translation.es: amenazan directamente las ganancias corporativas.

translation.en: When we try to find out how
translation.es: Cuando intentamos averiguar

translation.en: factory farms and how animal agriculture is polluting the environment,
translation.es: cómo contaminan la crianza intensiva y la agricultura animal,

translation.en: they try to claim exemptions to that information,
translation.es: intentan exponer exenciones a esa información,

translation.en: either under national security terms or public safety.
translation.es: por condiciones de seguridad nacional o de seguridad pública.

translation.en: Trademark issues, it's a business secret.
translation.es: Problemas de marca registrada, es un secreto empresarial.

translation.en: We've seen all these attempts
translation.es: Vimos todos estos intentos

translation.en: to keep people in the dark about what they're actually doing.
translation.es: por mantener lo que están haciendo en el ocultamiento.

translation.en: One of the largest industries on the planet,
translation.es: Una de las mayores industrias del planeta,

translation.en: with the biggest environmental impact,
translation.es: con el mayor impacto ambiental,

translation.en: trying to keep us in the dark about how it's operating.
translation.es: intenta mantener el ocultamiento sobre cómo opera.

translation.en: Through the Freedom of Information Act,
translation.es: Con la Ley de Libertad de Información,

translation.en: we obtained documents from the counter-terrorism unit
translation.es: obtuvimos documentos de la unidad antiterrorista

translation.en: that show they're monitoring my lectures,
translation.es: que muestran que están controlando mis conferencias,

translation.en: media interviews like this one, my website, my book.
translation.es: entrevistas mediáticas como esta, mi sitio web, mi libro.

translation.en: Are we at risk filming this and showing it?
translation.es: ¿Nos arriesgamos al filmar y mostrar esto?

translation.en: You're going up against people that have massive legal resources.
translation.es: Te enfrentas a gente que tiene enormes recursos legales.

translation.en: It's just overwhelming, the amount of money at their disposal.
translation.es: Es abrumadora la cantidad de dinero que tienen a disposición.

translation.en: And you have nothing.
translation.es: Y tú no tienes nada.

translation.en: And I think that fear is a big part of the tactic as well.
translation.es: Creo que el temor también es una parte importante de la táctica.

translation.en: Will was right. I was scared.
translation.es: Will tenía razón. Me asusté.

translation.en: When I learned about the activists being killed in Brazil,
translation.es: Cuando supe de los activistas asesinados en Brasil,

translation.en: I was disturbed, but I felt removed.
translation.es: quedé perturbado, pero lo sentí lejano.

translation.en: But to learn about American activists and journalists
translation.es: Ahora bien, ¿activistas y periodistas estadounidenses

translation.en: being targeted by the industry and FBI?
translation.es: perseguidos por la industria y el FBI?

translation.en: My funding being dropped?
translation.es: ¿Me retiran el financiamiento?

translation.en: I was genuinely worried and it hit close to home.
translation.es: Me sentí realmente preocupado, lo sentí cercano.

translation.en: Was this why no one was willing to talk about the issue?
translation.es: ¿Por eso nadie estaba dispuesto a hablar del tema?

translation.en: I decided to take precautionary measures with all the footage I shot.
translation.es: Decidí tomar medidas precautorias con todas las imágenes que filmé.

translation.en: I was beyond frightened to imagine what could possibly happen
translation.es: Me aterrorizó sobremanera imaginar lo que podría suceder

translation.en: if I pursued this subject any further.
translation.es: si yo seguía con este tema.

translation.en: It seemed the only decision to make was to put down the cameras and walk away.
translation.es: Parecía que la única decisión posible era apagar las cámaras y retirarme.

translation.en: But then I realized this issue was way bigger
translation.es: Pero luego entendí que este problema era mucho mayor

translation.en: than any personal concern I could ever have for myself.
translation.es: que las preocupaciones personales que yo pudiera tener.

translation.en: This was about all life on Earth hanging in the balance of our actions.
translation.es: Tenía que ver con la vida en la Tierra, que depende de nuestras acciones.

translation.en: Now you either live for something, or die for nothing.
translation.es: O vives por algo, o mueres por nada.

translation.en: And I actually had no choice all along.
translation.es: Y yo no tenía opción.

translation.en: I decided then to surrender not to fear from the secret,
translation.es: Entonces me entregué no al temor al secreto,

translation.en: but rather to a cause towards truth.
translation.es: sino a una causa por la verdad.

translation.en: I couldn't be like these environmental organizations
translation.es: Yo no podía hacer como esas organizaciones,

translation.en: and sit silently while the planet was
translation.es: sentarme en silencio mientras el planeta

translation.en: being eaten alive right in front of our eyes.
translation.es: es devorado frente a nuestros ojos.

translation.en: I had to stand up and continue on.
translation.es: Yo debía levantarme y seguir adelante.

translation.en: Some people would say the problem isn't really animal agriculture,
translation.es: Algunos dirían que el problema no es la ganadería,
